sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormGroup, FormControl, FormArray, Validators, NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-document-edit', templateUrl: './document-edit.component.html', styleUrls: ['./document-edit.component.css'] }) export class DocumentEditComponent implements OnInit { originalDocument: Document; document: Document; editMode: boolean = false; tsdocTitle = {"docTitle": "Whatever Title"} tsdocDesc = {"docDesc": "Whatever Description"} tsdocUrl = {"docUrl": "Whatever http://Url"} tsWhat = true; // tsdocUrl = {"docUrl": ""} ngOnInit(): void { } onSubmit(f: NgForm) { // console.log(f) console.log(this.tsdocTitle) console.log("Title Value is:", f.value.docTitle) console.log("Description Value is:", f.value.docDesc) console.log("Url Value is:", f.value.docUrl) } }
"The Document Title and Document URL are required fields"
